text: And at this point it is easy to imagine what the wife of Shelley thought of her son's education in England: "We shall bring him - a friend said to him on one occasion - to a school where he will be taught to drive according to his own ideas." - No, thank you - the wife said at once -. That is how his father was educated. But I would prefer a school where they teach him to drive in accordance with the ideas of others. FIN El Cuento, 1968
title: Educación
author: Alfonso Reyes
